value.name: Elise Bowden
value.description: Vigil Planned For Man Killed By Arlington Police OfficerMembers from the Next Generation Action Network are holding a vigil on Tuesday night to remember Tavis Crane, the man who was shot and ...

value.name: Woman Says Warrant Presented For Son Killed By Police: 'This Was Not A Mistake'
value.description: A Tarrant County Grand Jury has voted to take no action against Arlington Police Officer Craig Roper regarding the February 1 deadly shooting of Tavis Crane. Matt Yurus reports.
